SELECT A.AUCT_NO AS AUCT_NO, NVL(MAX(B.NOW_PRC),0) AS NOW_PRC FROM AUCT A LEFT JOIN AUCT_MEM B ON A.AUCT_NO = B.AUCT_NO GROUP BY A.AUCT_NO
